gameInstructions.title: Game Instructions
gameInstructions.intro: Mafia is a party game of strategy and deduction. Players are secretly assigned roles as either Mafia members, a Doctor, or Villagers. The Mafia try to eliminate the townspeople, while the townspeople try to identify and eliminate the Mafia.
gameInstructions.mafiaDesc: Vote during the night phase to eliminate a player. Work together to eliminate all villagers and the doctor.
gameInstructions.doctorDesc: Vote during the night phase to heal a player. If you heal the same player the mafia targets, you save them from death. Keep your identity secret!
gameInstructions.villagerDesc: Vote during the day phase to lynch a suspected mafia member. Use discussion and deduction to identify the mafia.
gameInstructions.roleDistributionDesc: For 7+ players: 2 Mafia, 1 Doctor, rest are Villagers. For smaller games: 1 Mafia, 1 Doctor, rest are Villagers.
gameInstructions.dayPhaseDesc: All alive players discuss and vote to lynch a suspect. The player with the most votes is eliminated. You can change your vote at any time during the phase.
gameInstructions.nightPhaseDesc: Mafia members vote to kill a player (majority vote decides). The Doctor votes to heal a player. If the Doctor heals the same player the Mafia targets, that player is saved. Villagers cannot act during the night.
gameInstructions.phaseTransition: Phases automatically transition after 60 seconds. The game alternates between Day and Night until a team wins.
gameInstructions.votingRule1: Only alive players can vote or comment
gameInstructions.votingRule2: Votes are counted by majority - the player with the most votes is selected
gameInstructions.votingRule3: You can change your vote at any time during the phase
gameInstructions.votingRule4: You can abstain by not voting or removing your vote
gameInstructions.mafiaWinsDesc1: Mafia equal or outnumber all other players (villagers + doctor)
gameInstructions.mafiaWinsDesc2: No doctors remain and Mafia equal or outnumber villagers
